verses.verse: And <WG2532> when <WG1230> the sabbath <WG4521> was past <WG1230> <WG5637>, Miryam <WG3137> from Magdala <WG3094>, and <WG2532> Miryam <WG3137> the mother <WG3588> of Ya`akov <WG2385>, and <WG2532> Shlomit <WG4539>, had bought <WG59> <WG5656> sweet spices <WG759>, that <WG2443> they might come <WG2064> <WG5631> and anoint <WG218> <WG5661> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> very <WG3029> early in the morning <WG4404> the first <WG3391> day of the week <WG4521>, they came <WG2064> <WG5736> unto <WG1909> the sepulchre <WG3419> at the rising <WG393> <WG5660> of the sun <WG2246>.

And <WG2532> they said <WG3004> <WG5707> among <WG4314> themselves <WG1438>, Who <WG5101> shall roll <WG617> us <WG2254> away <WG617> <WG5692> the stone <WG3037> from <WG1537> the door <WG2374> of the sepulchre <WG3419>?

And <WG2532> when they looked <WG308> <WG5660>, they saw <WG2334> <WG5719> that <WG3754> the stone <WG3037> was rolled away <WG617> <WG5769>: for <WG1063> it was <WG2258> <WG5713> very <WG4970> great <WG3173>.

And <WG2532> entering <WG1525> <WG5631> into <WG1519> the sepulchre <WG3419>, they saw <WG1492> <WG5627> a young man <WG3495> sitting <WG2521> <WG5740> on <WG1722> the right side <WG1188>, clothed <WG4016> <WG5772> in a long white <WG3022> garment <WG4749>; and <WG2532> they were affrighted <WG1568> <WG5681>.

And <WG1161> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Be <WG1568> not <WG3361> affrighted <WG1568> <WG5744>: Ye seek <WG2212> <WG5719> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> of Natzeret <WG3479>, which <WG3588> was crucified <WG4717> <WG5772>: he is risen <WG1453> <WG5681>; he is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> here <WG5602>: behold <WG2396> the place <WG5117> where <WG3699> they laid <WG5087> <WG5656> him <WG846>.

But <WG235> go your way <WG5217> <WG5720>, tell <WG2036> <WG5628> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> and <WG2532> Kefa <WG4074> that <WG3754> he goeth before <WG4254> <WG5719> you <WG5209> into <WG1519> the Galil <WG1056>: there <WG1563> shall ye see <WG3700> <WG5695> him <WG846>, as <WG2531> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto you <WG5213>.

And <WG2532> they went out <WG1831> <WG5631> quickly <WG5035>, and fled <WG5343> <WG5627> from <WG575> the sepulchre <WG3419>; for <WG1161> they <WG846> trembled <WG2192> <WG5707> <WG5156> and <WG2532> were amazed <WG1611>: neither <WG2532> said they <WG2036> <WG5627> any thing <WG3762> to any <WG3762> man; for <WG1063> they were afraid <WG5399> <WG5711>.

Now <WG1161> when Yeshuw`a was risen <WG450> <WG5631> early <WG4404> the first <WG4413> day of the week <WG4521>, he appeared <WG5316> <WG5648> first <WG4412> to Miryam <WG3137> from Magdala <WG3094>, out of <WG575> whom <WG3739> he had cast <WG1544> <WG5715> seven <WG2033> devils <WG1140>.

And she <WG1565> went <WG4198> <WG5679> and told <WG518> <WG5656> them that had been <WG1096> <WG5637> with <WG3326> him <WG846>, as they mourned <WG3996> <WG5723> and <WG2532> wept <WG2799> <WG5723>.

And they <WG2548>, when they had heard <WG191> <WG5660> that <WG3754> he was alive <WG2198> <WG5719>, and <WG2532> had been seen <WG2300> <WG5681> of <WG5259> her <WG846>, believed not <WG569> <WG5656>.

After <WG1161> <WG3326> that <WG5023> he appeared <WG5319> <WG5681> in <WG1722> another <WG2087> form <WG3444> unto two <WG1417> of <WG1537> them <WG846>, as they walked <WG4043> <WG5723>, and went <WG4198> <WG5740> into <WG1519> the country <WG68>.
And they <WG2548> went <WG565> <WG5631> and told <WG518> <WG5656> it unto the residue <WG3062>: neither <WG3761> believed they <WG4100> <WG5656> them <WG1565>.

Afterward <WG5305> he appeared <WG5319> <WG5681> unto the eleven <WG1733> as they <WG846> sat at meat <WG345> <WG5740>, and <WG2532> upbraided <WG3679> <WG5656> them with their <WG846> unbelief <WG570> and <WG2532> hardness of heart <WG4641>, because <WG3754> they believed <WG4100> <WG5656> not <WG3756> them which had seen <WG2300> <WG5666> him <WG846> after he was risen <WG1453> <WG5772>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Go ye <WG4198> <WG5679> into <WG1519> all <WG537> the world <WG2889>, and preach <WG2784> <WG5657> the gospel <WG2098> to every <WG3956> creature <WG2937>.
He that believeth <WG4100> <WG5660> and <WG2532> is immersed <WG907> <WG5685> shall be saved <WG4982> <WG5701>; but <WG1161> he that believeth not <WG569> <WG5660> shall be damned <WG2632> <WG5701>.

And <WG1161> these <WG5023> signs <WG4592> shall follow <WG3877> <WG5692> them that believe <WG4100> <WG5660>; In <WG1722> my <WG3450> name <WG3686> shall they cast out <WG1544> <WG5692> devils <WG1140>; they shall speak <WG2980> <WG5692> with new <WG2537> tongues <WG1100>;

They shall take up <WG142> <WG5692> serpents <WG3789>; and if <WG2579> they drink <WG4095> <WG5632> any <WG5100> deadly <WG2286> thing <WG5100>, it shall not <WG3364> hurt <WG984> <WG5692> them <WG846>; they shall lay <WG2007> <WG5692> hands <WG5495> on <WG1909> the sick <WG732>, and <WG2532> they shall <WG2192> <WG5692> recover <WG2573>.

So <WG3303> then <WG3767> after <WG3326> the YY <WG2962> had spoken <WG2980> <WG5658> unto them <WG846>, he was received up <WG353> <WG5681> into <WG1519> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> sat <WG2523> <WG5656> on <WG1537> the right hand <WG1188> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

And <WG1161> they <WG1565> went forth <WG1831> <WG5631>, and preached <WG2784> <WG5656> every where <WG3837>, the YY <WG2962> working with <WG4903> <WG5723> them, and <WG2532> confirming <WG950> <WG5723> the word <WG3056> with <WG1223> signs <WG4592> following <WG1872> <WG5723>. Amen <WG281>.
